body: YOOOOO all freshed up like this, man all we need is an english translation cause i wanna read it for the plot, like the original.

You and me both StrawberryMochi, I definitely was not expecting this. I literally created an account 4 years ago just to favorite the original one back when it first came out, and even after 4 long years it's still my most favorite doujin out of all the ones I've favorited.
I can't even say anything else since you just took the words right out of my mouth, this just made my day.

I'm pleasantly surprised. The original (https://nhentai.net/g/193806/) is my favorite doujin of all time and was released roughly four years ago. I definitely wasn't expecting my favorite to get a remake, let alone to be fully colored and more fleshed out. Is anyone working on a translation and decensored version? Regardless... just as wholesome as I remember. It's almost like your favorite game getting a remake.
It's so good, I actually read it for the plot too.
There's a English version of this I've read & It's so good that every time I reread I cum
The amount of time and effort put into this is absolutely insane. Props to the artist for his hard work!
